item.title: Double XP Ring
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Adds a double XP ring for your server, if you’d like to have one

Find

where your source handles server experience. You might have a better chance searching for

if you cannot find the other piece.

Replace with:

if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] == 6465) //your ring ID here { amount *= Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS * 4; } else { amount *= Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS; } if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] == 4202) //your ring ID here { amount *= Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS * 2; } else { amount *= Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS; }

Can be improved with an array if you want.

Credits:
JAVA

Read full topic
